episodes.synopsis: Dr. Matthew Cooper races to stop a global cataclysm when a deep-mining operation triggers a volcanic eruption that could result in human extinction.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: To stop the escalating crisis, Dr. Cooper and his colleagues devise an audacious, risky plan involving a sonar bomb and a converted space capsule.
episodes.title: Episode 2

video.title: Ring of Fire
video.synopsis: Stemming from a small town, a volcanic eruption triggered by an oil rig ignites a domino effect that threatens all of humanity around the world.
